title: singAra vElavan
sahitya:
singAra vElavan vandAn endanai ALa singAra vElavan vandAn


anupallavi

  pongAdaravODum aDangA magizhvoDum
Perumg kAdaloDum ayyan tangum mayiliniaDai tunga vaDivinoDu


caraNam    skandan paNiyum anbar sondhn karuNai koL mukundhan marugan murugan munden vinai payanda bandhattolait-taruLai indA indA enru Ezhai kudimuzhudum vAzha
aruLpuriya
